languages.text: "Избавленные от тлена преходящей жизни, стали мы явствовать как могучее единство. Ведомые насытившимися Ими, претворили врагов наших в ничто, но под игом Их не исторгли забвение об обмане. Шло уготовление, воплощалось оружие. Расколоты были Они, и заточены были фрагменты в темницы-тессеракты безвременные. Была война".

traits.locale_text: "Навсегда сотворив избавленье цепких пальцев погибели со своих глоток мы стали владеть мощь и единство. Ведомые насытившимися самой нашей сутью Звездными Богами, мы претворили наших врагов в могильную пыль. Но за тысячи вращений у лика безжалостных звезд, что потребовало воцарение ига непогубных Владык, мы ни на миг исторгли забвение о великом обмане К'тан. Мы были ожиданием и готовились, ибо вечность была в нашей власти".

languages.text: "Thus delivered from transient life's decay, we came forth as mighty unity. Guided by Them, who had now sated Themselves, we turned our foes to nought. But Their tyranny had not made us oblivious to deception. Preparations were made and armaments were fashioned. And They were shattered, and Their fragments were engaoled in timeless tesseract prisons. There was war."
languages.original_text: "Избавленные от тлена преходящей жизни, стали мы явствовать как могучее единство. Ведомые насытившимися Ими, претворили врагов наших в ничто, но под игом Их не исторгли забвение об обмане. Шло уготовление, воплощалось оружие. Расколоты были Они, и заточены были фрагменты в темницы-тессеракты безвременные. Была война".

And They were shattered, and Their fragments were engaoled in timeless tesseract prisons. There was war."

languages.text: «Por fin libres del declive transitorio de la vida, alcanzamos una poderosa unión. Con nuestros amos saciados, nos guiaron para aniquilar a nuestros enemigos. Pero su tiranía no nos había cegado ante sus engaños. Completamos nuestros preparativos y fabricamos nuestras armas. Los hicimos pedazos y sepultamos sus fragmentos en prisiones hipercúbicas atemporales. Llegó la guerra».
languages.original_text: "Thus delivered from transient life's decay, we came forth as mighty unity. Guided by Them, who had now sated Themselves, we turned our foes to nought. But Their tyranny had not made us oblivious to deception. Preparations were made and armaments were fashioned. And They were shattered, and Their fragments were engaoled in timeless tesseract prisons. There was war."

traits.locale_text: «Por fin libres del declive transitorio de la vida, alcanzamos una poderosa unión. Con nuestros amos saciados, nos guiaron para aniquilar a nuestros enemigos. Pero su tiranía no nos había cegado ante sus engaños. Completamos nuestros preparativos y fabricamos nuestras armas. Los hicimos pedazos y sepultamos sus fragmentos en prisiones hipercúbicas atemporales. Llegó la guerra».

languages.text: « Ainsi libérés du flétrissement inévitable de nos vies éphémères, nous avons pris la forme d'une puissante unité. Désormais rassasiés, Ils sont devenus nos guides et nous ont permis de réduire nos ennemis à néant. Cependant, même sous Leur joug, nous étions conscients de la tromperie. Nous nous sommes préparés et nous avons fabriqué des armes. C'est ainsi que nous Les avons anéantis et avons emprisonné Leurs fragments emprisonnés dans d'éternelles prisons tesseracts. Nous avons livré une guerre. »
languages.original_text: "Thus delivered from transient life's decay, we came forth as mighty unity. Guided by Them, who had now sated Themselves, we turned our foes to nought. But Their tyranny had not made us oblivious to deception. Preparations were made and armaments were fashioned. And They were shattered, and Their fragments were engaoled in timeless tesseract prisons. There was war."

traits.locale_text: « Ainsi libérés du flétrissement inévitable de nos vies éphémères, nous avons pris la forme d'une puissante unité. Désormais rassasiés, Ils sont devenus nos guides et nous ont permis de réduire nos ennemis à néant. Cependant, même sous Leur joug, nous étions conscients de la tromperie. Nous nous sommes préparés et nous avons fabriqué des armes. C'est ainsi que nous Les avons anéantis et avons emprisonné Leurs fragments emprisonnés dans d'éternelles prisons tesseracts. Nous avons livré une guerre. »

languages.text: 「移ろいゆく生命の腐敗から解放された結果、我々はしかと結束しました。今や腹を満たした彼らに導かれ、我々は敵を無へと転じたのです。ですが、彼らの専制の下でも、欺瞞への猜疑心は失ってはいませんでした。用意周到に武装化が完了し、そして彼らは打ち砕かれ、その破片は時間の概念無き超次元牢獄へと封じられました。戦争が起こったのです」
languages.original_text: "Thus delivered from transient life's decay, we came forth as mighty unity. Guided by Them, who had now sated Themselves, we turned our foes to nought. But Their tyranny had not made us oblivious to deception. Preparations were made and armaments were fashioned. And They were shattered, and Their fragments were engaoled in timeless tesseract prisons. There was war."

traits.locale_text: 「移ろいゆく生命の腐敗から解放された結果、我々はしかと結束しました。今や腹を満たした彼らに導かれ、我々は敵を無へと転じたのです。ですが、彼らの専制の下でも、欺瞞への猜疑心は失ってはいませんでした。用意周到に武装化が完了し、そして彼らは打ち砕かれ、その破片は時間の概念無き超次元牢獄へと封じられました。戦争が起こったのです」

languages.text: “就这样，我们从生命的衰亡之中解脱出来。我们团结一心，在他们的指引下，我们消灭了他们所有的敌人。然而，他们的暴行并没有让我们忘记如何欺骗。我们做好了所有的准备工作，准备好了所有的武器。我们粉碎了他们，将他们的碎片投入了永恒的超立方监狱中。这场战争就这样结束了。”
languages.original_text: "Thus delivered from transient life's decay, we came forth as mighty unity. Guided by Them, who had now sated Themselves, we turned our foes to nought. But Their tyranny had not made us oblivious to deception. Preparations were made and armaments were fashioned. And They were shattered, and Their fragments were engaoled in timeless tesseract prisons. There was war."

traits.locale_text: “就这样，我们从生命的衰亡之中解脱出来。我们团结一心，在他们的指引下，我们消灭了他们所有的敌人。然而，他们的暴行并没有让我们忘记如何欺骗。我们做好了所有的准备工作，准备好了所有的武器。我们粉碎了他们，将他们的碎片投入了永恒的超立方监狱中。这场战争就这样结束了。”

languages.text: "Derart vom Verfall des flüchtigen Lebens erlöst, sind wir als mächtige Einheit vorgetreten. Von ihnen geführt, die sich nun selbst gesättigt hatten, haben wir unsere Feinde in Nichts verwandelt. Doch ihre Tyrannei hat uns nicht unfähig gemacht, Täuschung zu erkennen. Vorbereitungen wurden getroffen, Waffen wurden gefertigt. Und sie wurden zertrümmert und ihre Fragmente wurden in zeitlosen Tesserakt-Gefängnissen eingekerkert. Es gab Krieg."
languages.original_text: "Thus delivered from transient life's decay, we came forth as mighty unity. Guided by Them, who had now sated Themselves, we turned our foes to nought. But Their tyranny had not made us oblivious to deception. Preparations were made and armaments were fashioned. And They were shattered, and Their fragments were engaoled in timeless tesseract prisons. There was war."

traits.locale_text: "Derart vom Verfall des flüchtigen Lebens erlöst, sind wir als mächtige Einheit vorgetreten. Von ihnen geführt, die sich nun selbst gesättigt hatten, haben wir unsere Feinde in Nichts verwandelt. Doch ihre Tyrannei hat uns nicht unfähig gemacht, Täuschung zu erkennen. Vorbereitungen wurden getroffen, Waffen wurden gefertigt. Und sie wurden zertrümmert und ihre Fragmente wurden in zeitlosen Tesserakt-Gefängnissen eingekerkert. Es gab Krieg."

languages.text: "Fâni yaşamın çürümesinden kurtulduk ve kudretli bir birliktelik meydana getirdik. Kendilerini doyuranların rehberliğinde düşmanlarımızı bertaraf ettik. Ancak Onların hükümdarlığı, bizi aldatılmaya karşı dikkatsiz kılmadı. Hazırlıklar yapıldı ve silahlar hazırlandı. Onlar parçalandı ve Onların parçacıkları, zamansız teserakt hapishanelere kapatıldı. Savaş gerçekleşti."
languages.original_text: "Thus delivered from transient life's decay, we came forth as mighty unity. Guided by Them, who had now sated Themselves, we turned our foes to nought. But Their tyranny had not made us oblivious to deception. Preparations were made and armaments were fashioned. And They were shattered, and Their fragments were engaoled in timeless tesseract prisons. There was war."
